backend/main.mo: Actor manages presale progress, contributions, and allocations with validation and status queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing all frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing presale sections, listings, footer, and background music controller with animated background.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: UI controller for background music showing mute and volume controls when music is playing.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright and caffeine.ai attribution with tracking.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays contributors list with auto-refresh, aggregation, timestamps, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: 24-hour countdown timer showing hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows the presale deposit address with copy button and auto-detection notice.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Renders the presale hero section with a main image, animated title, tagline, and three feature cards. Focuses on visual presentation and promotional messaging.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Displays a step-by-step guide on how to contribute to the presale, including cap details and important info. Uses constants to show dynamic ICP values.
frontend/src/components/presale/PostPres: Shows different listing states based on presale status, including loading, coming soon, or actual post-presale listings. Uses hooks and constants to populate listing data.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Displays live presale progress with auto-refresh, progress bar, stats, and an end badge. Computes ICP totals and status from presale data.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress display, and deposit address into one section. Provides an overview of presale status and requirements.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Presents tokenomics details and a FAQ section using constants for supply values. Highlights token attributes and answers common questions.
frontend/src/constants/listingsAfterPres: Defines the ListingItem interface and a static list of planned post-presale listings. Each listing includes a title, optional description, and status.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Exports presale configuration constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval. Used throughout the presale UI for dynamic values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication using React Query. Automatically refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Provides a hook to manage background music playback, handling audio creation, preferences, autoplay blocking, and user-initiated play.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches contributor data via react-query, polling periodically using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Implements a 24-hour countdown timer that updates every second and returns hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Queries the presale status from the actor API with periodic polling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom neon-themed utilities, animations, and color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Handles loading and saving background music preferences and opt-in state using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates raw contributions into per-address summaries with totals and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers with dot thousand separators using the German locale.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, neon variables, plugins, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for the IcpMemeDoge presale site, including requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features. Captures functionality for ICP monitoring, presale logic, UI behavior, and deployment status.
